metadata.title: Christopher Knight Home Anastasia Tufted Club Chair, Grey
features: The Anastasia Tufted chair is a great piece for any room in your home. The Detailing on the chair Back as well as the added Cushion give it a touch of elegance while still retaining all of the comfort benefits of an upholstered chair. With a unique Mod look this chair will make a statement as bold as the design.
Dimensions in": L 32 x W 32 x H 35.5
